steps.code: const transfers = []; document.querySelectorAll('.responsive-table tbody tr, table.items tbody tr').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 20) { const playerEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/profil/"], .hauptlink a'); const fromEl = el.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/startseite/"]')[0]; const toEl = el.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/startseite/"]')[1]; const feeEl = el.querySelector('.rechts a, td.rechts'); transfers.push({ player: playerEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', from: fromEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', to: toEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', fee: feeEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { transfer_count: transfers.length, transfers };
